name: BAAI/Infinity-Instruct
description: The Infinity Instruct dataset, a collaborative effort by the Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence (BAAI), is a game-changer in the realm of artificial intelligence. This dataset, with its focus on large-scale instruction data, offers an unprecedented opportunity for researchers and developers to fine-tune their models. By addressing the need for high-quality, extensive data, the Infinity Instruct dataset is poised to significantly impact the performance of open-source models, particularly in the area of programmatic mathematical reasoning.
citeAs: @misc{zhang2024inifinitymath,       title={InfinityMATH: A Scalable Instruction Tuning Dataset in Programmatic Mathematical Reasoning},        author={Bo-Wen Zhang and Yan Yan and Lin Li and Guang Liu},       year={2024},       eprint={2408.07089},       archivePrefix={arXiv},       primaryClass={cs.LG},       url={https://arxiv.org/abs/2408.07089},  }
creator: Beijing Academy of Artificial Intelligence
keywords: Large-scale instruction data, Programmatic Mathematical Reasoning, Fine-tuning datasets
